About.paragraph: AresVN is a Vietnamese esports team. The team was originally created in 2019 as a Counter-Strike team, then expanded to include more games like Valorant, Rainbow Six: Siege. The team's name is taken from the name of the god of war in Greek mythology, so the team is also known as Việt Chiến Thần. With the motto "The circus is not born or destroyed, but only changes from game to game", the team has left a deep comedy mark from competitive games to entertaining PvE games.

Features.text: We give away thousands of AWPs every day.

Features.title: Rush B
Features.text: We rush B whenever we have little cash, we have lots of cash, we are happy, we are depressed.

Features.title: Nó hack rồi
Features.text: We always say this when the enemy is cheating, better than us, or Ching Chong.

Relationships.name: G3 Esports
descriptions: As a rival team, AresVN and G3 Esports once held a fiery match in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive on February 19, 2021. G3 Esports used the strongest lineup while AresVN's lineup was half of sub-team. The match resulted in the victory going to G3 Esports.

As an ally team, AresVN and G3 Esports have a supportive relationship with each other. G3 Esports regularly sends members to fill the slots for AresVN. The two also have matches together, and there is a 5vs5 match with members of both teams mixed.
